title: Why did the player stop using the game?
self_text: I know it is a question that has been asked many times before, but no one seems to have any concrete answers.  I was just thinking about how much less active the community is now compared to when it was still being updated regularly and people were more engaged with the modding scene.   The most common answer is that Mojang has gone downhill. But why? Is it because they stopped making changes or are there other factors involved? Or perhaps it's simply a shift in interest from players as they move on to newer games? Does anyone have insights into what caused this decline?

title: Does anyone know how to make a bed that can be killed with a sword?
self_text: Yes, but if you use a stone sword on the bed, it will be destroyed.  If you use an iron or better sword on the bed, it will not be destroyed and you cannot sleep in it. You must replace the bed with a stone block and then use the stone sword to destroy the block and place your bed back.
